snippet: The archive in Washington, D.C. will host a permanent exhibition depicting the struggles of women, African-Americans and immigrants.
abstract: The archive in Washington, D.C. will host a permanent exhibition depicting the struggles of women, African-Americans and immigrants.

headline.main: Expansion at the National Archives Means More Focus on Human Rights
headline.print_headline: For New Space, Archives Plans Exhibition on Rights
